ValidationRule.description: NOKIASC-31033: "Renegotiation Start Date" cannot be prior to "Start Date" nor later than "End Date".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_VendorContract' , NOT(ISBLANK(CH_RenegotiationStartDate__c)) ,( ( NOT( StartDate < CH_RenegotiationStartDate__c) && NOT(ISBLANK(StartDate ))) || ( NOT( CH_RenegotiationStartDate__c < EndDate ) && (NOT(ISBLANK(EndDate )))) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Renegotiation Start Date" cannot be prior to "Start Date" nor later than "End Date".
